question: Who was honoured with the "Philanthropist of the year" Asian award?
explanation: Dr Jack Preger was named Philanthropist of The Year at a star-studded Asian Awards ceremony in London. The award recognises his extraordinary contribution in helping the poorest of the poor in Kolkata for the past 38 years. It is for the first time that a living person not of Asian origin has been honoured at the awards, though Mother Teresa received a posthumous award last year.
